ARLE: Mechanical Design¶

The mechanical design of the robot comprises of below mentioned components :-

Major Components¶

Major components in ARLE’s structure :-

  • Chassiss
    • The chassis of the robot has dimensions 110 mm x 70 mm and is made of Mild Steel Bars.
  • Book Manipulator
    • A gripper which can hold heavy books.
  • Scissor Lift
    • A scissor lift to vary the height of the gripper over the racks.
  • Chassis
    • Steel Frame
    • Wheel Assembly
    • Nylon Wheel
    • MS Shaft
    • Pillow Block Bearing
    • Flexible Spyder Coupling
    • PMDC Motor
